Privacy Policy

How we collect, use, and protect your information.

1. Information We Collect

When you make a purchase or contact us, we may collect:

  • Contact information: Name, email address, phone number
  • Shipping information: Mailing address for print delivery
  • Payment information: Processed securely by Stripe (we do not store card details)
  • Order information: Products purchased, order history
  • Communication records: Messages sent through our contact form

2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information solely for:

  • Processing and fulfilling your print orders
  • Communicating about your order status
  • Responding to your inquiries
  • Sending shipping notifications
  • Handling damage claims or customer service issues

We do not use your information for marketing purposes unless you explicitly opt in.

3. Information Sharing

We share your information only with:

  • Stripe: Our payment processor, to securely handle transactions
  • Pictorem: Our print fulfillment partner, to produce and ship your order (name and shipping address only)
  • Resend: Our transactional email service, to send order confirmations and shipping notifications (email address only)

We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.

4. Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your information:

  • All payment processing is handled by Stripe using industry-standard encryption
  • We use HTTPS encryption on our website
  • Access to customer data is limited to essential personnel only
  • We do not store credit card numbers on our systems

5. Cookies & Analytics

Our website may use:

  • Essential cookies: Required for basic website functionality
  • Analytics: We may use privacy-respecting analytics to understand how visitors use our site

We do not use advertising cookies or sell data to advertisers.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
  • Correction: Ask us to correct inaccurate information
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal retention requirements)
  • Opt-out: Unsubscribe from any marketing communications

To exercise these rights, contact us using the information below.

7. Data Retention

We retain your information for as long as necessary to:

  • Fulfill your orders and provide customer service
  • Comply with legal and tax obligations (typically 7 years for financial records)
  • Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements

8. Children's Privacy

Our website is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

9. International Transfers

Your information may be processed in the United States and Canada where our services operate. By using our website, you consent to this transfer.

10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of our website after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

11. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights:

  • Email: wolf@archive-35.com
  • Website: Contact Form

Last updated: February 7, 2026
